item.title: David add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Both Rowling and Meyer, they’re speaking directly to young people. … The real difference is that Jo Rowling is a terrific writer and Stephenie Meyer can’t write worth a darn. She’s not very good." -- Stephen King

item.title: David add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Stephenie Meyer: Her vampires are sparkly, which I think we can all agree is wrong." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: David add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Twilight fell: The sky turned to a light, dusky purple littered with tiny silver stars." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: David add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we drove on toward death through the cooling twilight." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: David add a quote by Tove Jansson
item.description: "One summer morning at sunrise a long time ago I met a little girl with a book under her arm. I asked her why she was out so early and she answered that there were too many books and far too little time. And there she was absolutely right." -- Tove Jansson
